entries: The alatreon magically causes lightning to strike, within 120 feet of it, along a 45-foot long line, that is 5 feet wide. It then causes lightning to strike along another 45-foot long, 5-foot-wide line, but this line must begin in a 5-foot space of the original lightning strikes or pass through it at one point in the line. Each creature in a line, must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 5d8}) lightning damage and be afflicted with {@condition thunderblight|MHMM} for 1 minute on a failed save, or half as much damage and is not afflicted with thunderblight on a successful one.

A creature in the area of more than one line, makes their saving throw at disadvantage, but does not take any additional damage. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the thunderblight on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Lightning Storm
entries: Numerous bolts of lightning strike the ground in a 120-foot radius around the alatreon. Choose three creatures, each of which must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage and be afflicted with {@condition thunderblight|MHMM} for 1 minute on a failed save, or half as much damage and is not afflicted with thunderblight on a successful one. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the thunderblight on itself on a success.

mythicHeader: The alatreon can use the options below as legendary actions depending on which state it is currently in, as determined by its mythic trait:

mythic.name: Dragon State
entries: The alatreon can use the following legendary actions while in the dragon state.

items.name: Multiattack
entries: The alatreon uses its multiattack.

items.name: Dragon Rush
entries: The alatreon moves up to half its fly speed in a straight line, during this move it may move through other creatures without provoking attacks of opportunity. Each creature or object the alatreon moves through must succeed on a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage and be knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage and isn't knocked prone on a successful one.

mythic.name: Fire State
entries: The alatreon can use the following legendary actions while in the fire state.

items.name: Fireball
entries: The alatreon exhales a fireball to a point within 120 feet of it. Each creature in a 15-foot radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Fire Breath Y
entries: The alatreon exhales fire in a 45-foot line that is 5 feet wide and then splits into a two more lines forming a "Y" shape that are 30 feet long and wide 5 feet. Each creature in a line must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Scorched Earth
entries: The alatreon rises 30 feet into the air, without provoking opportunity attacks, and exhales flames that covers the ground in a 30-foot radius centered on a point directly below it. The ground continues to burn until the start of the alatreon's next turn. Flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that starts its turn in the area or enters it for the first time on a turn takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage and ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the burning creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. When a creature moves into or within the area, it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage for every 5 feet it travels.

mythic.name: Ice State
entries: The alatreon can use the following legendary actions while in the ice state.

items.name: Frost Breath
entries: The alatreon rises 30 feet into the air, without provoking opportunity attacks, and exhales frost that covers the ground in a 30-foot radius centered on a point directly below it. The frost remains until the start of the alatreon's next turn and Each creature that starts its turn in that area must make a {@dc 27} Constitution saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 5d6}) cold damage and be afflicted with {@condition iceblight|MHMM} for 1 minute on a failed save, or half as much damage and is not afflicted with iceblight on a successful one. When a creature moves into or within the area, it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage for every 5 feet it travels.

items.name: Ice Shards
entries: The alatreon freezes the air around it creating ice shards that fill a 5-foot-cube in the air above each creature in a 90-foot radius around it, before they plummet to the ground. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save the creature takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) cold damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) bludgeoning damage, is pushed 5 feet into an unoccupied space, and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, is pushed 5 feet into an unoccupied space, but isn't knocked prone. If there are no unoccupied spaces around the creature, it fails its saving throw and is knocked prone under the ice chunk until it melts, is destroyed, or it succeeds on a {@dc 20} {@skill Athletics} check.

The ice shards remain in the spaces they land in until they melt at the start of the alatreon's next turn. The ice shards can be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; 10 hit points; vulnerable to fire damage; immune to cold, poison, and psychic damage). If the ice shard takes necrotic damage, it instead explodes in a 15-foot radius dealing 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage to each creature in that area.

reaction.name: Element Burst
entries: When the alatreon changes active states it can use this special reaction to release elemental energy into the area around it. Each creature in a 30-foot radius-sphere around the alatreon must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. The damage type is determined by the active state the alatreon changes into: fire damage for fire state, necrotic damage for dragon state, and cold damage for ice state.

Within the New World, the {@creature alatreon|MHMM} has taken on a unique form of water element alongside its four existing elements. The alatreon is also capable of creating unique ice structures that explode when struck. Finally, alatreon's mastery over the elements has been enhanced beyond what was previously known, allowing the alatreon to take on unique active forms based on three core elements; fire state, ice state and dragon state. When transitioning between its dragon state and either fire or ice state, alatreon will generate an immense pool of elemental energy, eventually allowing it to execute a devastating burst of elements known as the Escaton Judgment, decimating any who are unfortunate enough to be within the vicinity of this tremendous power.

items.name: Alatreon Mantle
entries: {@i Blightproof.} 穿着这件盔甲时，你对枯萎法术、类似法术的能力和条件免疫。

items.name: Alatreon Riptalon
entries: {@i Evasion+.}当你穿上这件盔甲时，你的所有救赎动作都会获得+1的奖励，并且你在灵巧的救赎动作上有优势。

items.name: Alatreon Pallium
entries: While wearing this armor you can use an action to cast the {@spell control weather} spell from it. Once used, you can't use this property again for 1 week.

items.name: Alatreon Diretail
entries: {@i Iron Wall+.}当你穿上这件盔甲时，你的盔甲等级有+3的奖励。

items.name: Alatreon Direwing
entries: {@i Health Boost+2.} While wearing this armor, your hit point maximum increases by 3 for each character level you have.

items.name: Skyswayer
entries: 当你穿上这件盔甲时，你对法术和其他魔法效果的救赎有优势。

items.name: Azure Dragonsphire
entries: You are immune to force damage and resistant to necrotic damage while you wear this armor.

items.name: Alatreon Mantle
entries: {@i Critical Element.} When you critically hit with a weapon or spell that deals cold, fire, lightning, necrotic, or thunder damage, you deal an extra {@damage 1d10} damage of that type.

items.name: Alatreon Riptalon
entries: {@i Resentment.} Until the end of your turn, you gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls against any creature that has damaged you since the end of your last turn.

items.name: Alatreon Pallium
entries: {@i Critical Eye+2.}你的武器攻击关键命中范围增加3。

items.name: Alatreon Diretail
entries: While you are attuned to this weapon, your cold, fire, and lightning spells bypass a creatures resistance and immunities.

items.name: Alatreon Direwing
entries: Your weapon deals an extra {@damage 1d12} damage. This damage can be cold, fire, lightning, or necrotic damage (your choice).

items.name: Skyswayer
entries: {@i Critical Status (Blight).} When you make a weapon attack with this weapon, and roll a 20 for the attack roll, the target is afflicted with {@condition dragonblight|MHMM}, {@condition iceblight|MHMM}, {@condition thunderblight|MHMM}, or {@condition waterblight|MHMM} (your choice) until the end of its next turn.

items.name: Azure Dragongem
entries: {@i Power Prolonger.}根据该材料被放入哪个武器，它将获得以下好处。

items.name: Dual Blades
entries: 恶魔/超恶魔模式的持续时间增加30秒。

items.name: Great Sword
entries: 在使用的回合中，护卫会给予+4的交流奖励。

items.name: Hunting Horn
entries: 旋律的持续时间增加1分钟。

items.name: Insect Glaive
entries: 金虫精华的持续时间增加1分钟。

items.name: Lance
entries: 力量护卫在使用的回合内给予一个+4的交流奖励。

items.name: Switch Axe
entries: 外套武器的持续时间增加1分钟。

items.name: Tonfas
entries: 大地风格。武器伤害模子增加到D10。

items.name: Elder Dragon Blood
entries: 任何稀有的武器升级材料。

items.name: Elder Dragon Bone
entries: 任何稀有的装甲升级材料。

entries.name: Alatreon Material Bonus
entries: 当一个角色在其装备上镶嵌了两个成年的alatreon材料时，他们会获得（%0%）的奖励。当他们的装备上镶嵌了三块回火的alatreon材料时，他们会获得{@i Alatreon Divinity+}的奖励。
{@b Alatreon Divinity.}当你造成冷、火、或闪电伤害时，伤害模子增加1个大小。
{@b Alatreon Divinity+.}你获得第一个{@i alatreon divinity}的好处，你对冷、火和雷电伤害有抵抗力。

trait.name: Blinding Panic
entries: When the chameloes is {@condition invisible} and is {@condition blinded} by a {@item flash bomb|AGMH} or other effect, it panics and loses concentration. While the chameloes is blinded, it is unable to use its Invisible Passage.

trait.name: Chameleon Skin
entries: The chameleos has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to {@action hide}.

trait.name: Deadly Poison
entries: Poison damage dealt by the chameleos, including poison damage a creature takes at the start of its turn from the {@condition poisoned} condition, bypasses a creature's resistance to poison damage and deals half damage to creatures that are immune to poison damage.

trait.name: Elder Dragon Sight
entries: Magical Darkness doesn't impede the chameleos's darkvision.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries: The chameleos can innately cast the {@spell fog cloud} spell at 3rd-level at will. It doesn't need to concentrate on the spell, but when recast, the previous fog cloud dissipates.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: 如果变色龙的拯救动作失败，它可以选择成功。

trait.name: Silent Step
entries: 当{@condition invisible}，作为一个额外的动作，变色龙最多可以传送30英尺到一个没有人的空间。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chameleos makes two attacks with its horn or two attacks with its claws.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Horn
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and the target and each Medium or smaller creature adjacent to the target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw, or be pushed 10 feet away from the chameleos and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. On hit, if the target has an object in at least one hand, they must make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or have the object swallowed by the Chameleos. If the chameleos takes 30 damage in one turn, it regurgitates all swallowed objects in an 5 foot area adjacent to it.

action.name: Poison Fountain (Must be in fog)
entries: The chameleos looks up and exhales three poison balls into the air, each of which can strike a target within the fog cloud. A target must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. While poisoned in this way, the creature takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature may repeat its saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the poison on a success.

action.name: Poison Ring {@recharge 5}
entries: The chameleos flies 15 feet into the air without provoking opportunity attacks and exhales poisonous gas that spreads across the ground in a 30-foot radius centered directly below the chameleos. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) poison damage and be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute on a failed save, or half as much damage and isn't poisoned on a successful one. While poisoned in this way, the creature takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature may repeat its saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the poison on a success.

action.name: Invisible Passage
entries: 变色龙会神奇地变成（%0%），直到它攻击或施法，或直到它的注意力结束（就像集中在一个法术上）。在{@condition invisible}的时候，变色龙不会留下任何物质证据，所以只能通过魔法来追踪它。

legendary.name: Attack (2/round)
entries: The chameleos attacks with its tongue or tail.

legendary.name: Transparent
entries: The chameleos uses its invisible passage.

legendary.name: Mist (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The chameleos casts the {@spell fog cloud} spell at 3rd-level.

legendary.name: Poison Breath (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The chameleos exhales poisonous gas in a 90-foot line that is 5-feet wide. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage and be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute on a failed save, or half as much damage and isn't poisoned on a successful one. While poisoned in this way, the creature takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature may repeat its saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the poison on a success.
变色龙的身体被紫色和白色的皮所覆盖，它的头部在鼻尖处有一个突出的角。它的眼睛与现实生活中的变色龙相似；大而像球体，有单独控制眼睛运动的能力。长而有弹性的舌头可以伸出来抓取并从远处偷取物品。它的翅膀是紫色的，有一层灰白色的膜，用于飞行和控制其毒雾的方向。变色龙的大尾巴让人联想到一片叶子，并有一个卷曲的螺旋状尾端。

变色龙与其他长老龙不同，因为它们的外表不像其他长老龙物种那样 "优雅"。变色龙有一些生物适应性，使它们非常独特。最值得注意的是变色龙的标志性伪装机制。每个物种的变色龙都有不同的伪装方式。通过在其皮肤上产生一种微弱的电流，与它可以呼吸的雾气相互作用，长老龙可以弯曲自己周围的光线，使其有效地隐身。一些变色龙使用特殊的矿石来实现其伪装。变色龙有独立活动的眼球，从它的头部两侧突出，以创造更广阔的视野。变色龙有几种讨厌的防御手段，如果它受到攻击。它们拥有一种极强的毒药，可以随意从它的嘴里释放出来，并经常被龙的翅膀鞭打成厚厚的云。一些变色龙还拥有一种额外的声带麻痹毒药，在它的酸液团中。最后，它可以呼出大量的雾气，进一步阻碍猎人的视线，使它既可以迅速逃离，也可以轻松地发动突然袭击。

变色龙是伏击猎手，耐心等待猎物经过，同时完美地融入周围环境。变色龙几乎可以吃任何东西，并且可以使用不同的战术来对付不同大小的猎物。如果它的猎物是Neopteron，如{@creature Vespoid|MHMM}、{@creature Altaroth|MHMM}、{@creature Bnahabra|MHMM}或{@creature Konchu|MHMM}，它就会用它长长的粘性舌头把它从空中抓下来。如果是一个补给营，它就会利用每一次机会偷窃。
变色龙是非常聪明的生物。它们会在一个重要的地点耐心等待，如水源或天然十字路口，等待猎物经过。变色龙以偷窃冒险者的物品而闻名。变色龙这样做是为了让冒险者失去追捕它们的动力。

items.name: T.Chameleos Speckled Hide
entries: While wearing this armor all creatures have disadvantage on skills checks when trying to track you. Additionally you leave no footprints while you are {@condition invisible}.

items.name: T.Chameleos Wing
entries: 当你穿上这件盔甲时，你在灵巧性（（%0%））检查方面有优势。

items.name: T.Chameleos Claw
entries: {@i Evade Window.} 这个盔甲有3个符文，每天在黎明时分恢复1d3个已消耗的符文。当你穿着它的时候，你的灵巧救赎失败，你可以用你的反应来消耗它的一个符文来代替救赎成功。

items.name: TC.Deadly Poison Sac
entries: {@i Rock Steady.}穿戴此盔甲时，你不能被不情愿地击倒{@condition prone}，并且你无视库沙拉达奥拉和阿玛松的风障等效果。

items.name: T.Chameleos Tail
entries: 当你穿上这件盔甲时，你对寒冷伤害有免疫力。

items.name: T.Chameleos Spike
entries: While you are wearing this armor and you take damage, you can use your reaction to magically turn {@condition invisible} until the start of your next turn or until you attack, make a damage roll, or force someone to make a saving throw. You can use this property twice, regaining all expended uses when you finish a short or long rest.

items.name: T.Chameleos Gem
entries: You are resistant to poison damage and immune to the {@condition poisoned} condition while you wear this armor.

items.name: T.Chameleos Speckled Hide
entries: This weapon is transparent while sheathed or stowed on your body. If a creature uses its action to examine you, the creature can see the slight shimmer of the weapon with a successful {@dc 20} Wisdom ({@skill Perception}).

items.name: T.Chameleos Wing
entries: {@i Peak Performance.}当你的命中率已满，而你用近战武器进行攻击时，你在伤害骰子上掷出1或2，你可以重新掷骰子，并且必须使用新的骰子，即使新的骰子是1或2。

items.name: T.Chameleos Claw
entries: {@i (Ranged weapon only) Deadeye+.} 你的武器的正常攻击范围增加一倍。

items.name: TC.Deadly Poison Sac
entries: {@i (Druid, Sorcerer, Warlock & Wizard only)} 这把武器有10个符文。当你持有这把武器时，你可以使用一个动作来消耗它的一个或多个符文，用你的法术保全DC来施展以下一个法术：{@spell dragon's breath|XGE}（毒药）（1个符文），{@spell fog cloud}（1个符文），（%3%）（2个符文），（%4%）（2个符文）或，（%5%）（3个符文）。该武器每天在黎明时分恢复1d4+1个已消耗的符文。如果你消耗了最后一个符文，它在一周内不能再获得任何符文。

items.name: T.Chameleos Tail
entries: You gain a + 2 bonus to your spell attack rolls and spell save DC while attuned to this weapon. This bonus increases to +4 when the spell you are casting deals poison damage.

items.name: T.Chameleos Spike
entries: {@i Status Crit (Poison).} Whenever you critically hit with this weapon, the target creature must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save the target is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute.

items.name: T.Chameleos Gem
entries: {@i Mind's Eye.}你用此武器的攻击能绕过任何生物的伤害抵抗。

items.name: TC.Deadly Poison Sac
entries: 你可以用这种材料为原料，再加上一个{@item vial|PHB}，进行一次{@dc 17}智慧({@item Poisoner's Kit|PHB})检查。如果成功，你可以制造一个{@item midnight tears|DMG}的小瓶（DMG第258页）。如果失败，材料会被销毁。

items.name: Elder Dragon Blood
entries: 任何稀有的武器升级材料。

items.name: Elder Dragon Bone
entries: 任何稀有的装甲升级材料。

entries.name: A Chameleos's Lair
entries: 林居变色龙极少与其他龙分享它们的领地。凭借其随意隐身的能力，它能从任何试图入侵和占领的事物中窃取宝物。变色龙的巢穴有时会与绿龙的巢穴相混淆，因为它们都有一个永久的雾气挂在空中，变色龙带着一缕更甜的毒雾。小小的蘑菇，被称为 "蛤蟆草"，在地面上随处可见，只要轻轻一碰就会释放出有毒的孢子。随着你对森林的深入，它们会越来越大。
在森林的中心，变色龙选择了一个通常布满蘑菇的小树林。树林里的树木很稀疏，允许变色龙自由进出。在中间挖了一个洞，里面装满了变色龙从迷路的人、冒险家以及它在旅行中偷来的任何东西中收集的财宝。

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: 如果可怕的米拉里斯的拯救动作失败，它可以选择成功。

trait.name: Magma Armor
entries: When the dire miralis is below half of its maximum hp, its body cools and AC increases by +5.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: 恐怖的米拉利斯对物体和结构造成双倍伤害。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 地狱米拉利斯进行两次爪子攻击。或者它进行两次岩浆球攻击。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Magma Glob
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 6d10}) fire damage and the space it is in, is covered in lava for 24 hours before cooling. On a miss, an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target is covered in lava. The lava ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried and creature that starts its turn in the lava or enters the space for the first time on a turn, takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Crush
entries: The dire miralis slams its body on the ground in a 40-foot square in front of it. Each creature in that areas must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked {@condition prone} and take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) bludgeoning damage and 22 ({@damage 5d8}) fire damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked {@condition prone}, and is pushed 5 feet out of the dire miralis's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is with in range, the creature instead falls {@condition prone} in the dire miralis's space.

action.name: Greater Fireball {@recharge 5}
entries: The dire miralis exhales a massive fireball within 150 feet of its location. Each creature in a 25-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 63 ({@damage 18d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Move
entries: 地狱蜃楼的移动速度达到了它的速度，不会引起机会攻击。

legendary.name: Tremor
entries: The dire miralis stomps on the ground sending a tremor out in a 60-foot radius around it. Each creature other than the dire miralis on the ground in that area must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Magma Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 地狱米拉里斯进行了一次岩浆球攻击。

Dire Miralis是一种非常大的、半水生的长老龙。它的身体结构让人联想到（%0%），四肢相对较短，尾巴和脖子很长。它的身体充满了类似岩浆的物质，这些物质在尾巴的底部、胸部和每个肩膀处汇集。每个池子都能引导岩浆流向身体的某些部位。在它的背上有一对翅膀般的附属物。这些 "翅膀 "在飞行方面似乎毫无用处，但其特点是可以挤出岩浆球，既是一种防御手段，也是一种抛弃多余岩浆的方法。Dire Miralis的头部有一个类似褶皱的结构和一个上翘的鼻子。
由于Dire Miralis体内的热液，众所周知，一种强烈的热量会从它的身体中传出，使它周围的任何水源沸腾。这种强烈的热量可以轻易地消灭Dire Miralis范围内的所有生物。
有趣的是，在Dire Miralis死后很久，它的心脏还在继续跳动，即使被摘除--正如传说中那样。据说Dire Miralis仅凭心脏就能使整个身体再生，而且Dire Miralis甚至是不死之身。
Dire Miralis对所有生物都有极大的敌意，仅凭其强烈的热量就能摧毁整个生态系统。一个Dire Miralis实际上摧毁了Tainted Sea，并杀死了该地区的所有生物，使水充满血腥，直到它在古代被赶走。这种怪物是许多猎人无法活着讲述的。

items.name: T.Miralis Scale
entries: {@i Current Resist.}当你穿着这件盔甲时，你不会受到水流的影响，无论是自然的还是魔法的，除非你另外选择。

items.name: T.Miralis Fireback
entries: {@i Windproof.}你所施展的法术，如{@spell fog cloud}，在你穿上此盔甲时，不能再被风、魔法或其他方式所驱散。

items.name: T.Gushing Magma
entries: {@i HG Earplugs.}当你与此盔甲相适应时，你可以使用一个额外的动作来变出两个你选择的形状的耳塞。在使用这些耳塞时，你只能听到你选择的生物的声音，并且你对雷霆伤害的救赎有优势。

items.name: T.Immortal Heart
entries: When you are below half of your maximum hit points, you can use your bonus action to increase your AC by 3 for 1 minute. Once you use this feature, you cannot use it again until you complete a short or long rest.

items.name: T.Miralis Hellwing
entries: 当你穿上这件盔甲时，你对火灾伤害有豁免权。

items.name: T.Miralis Evil Eye
entries: {@i Rock Steady.}穿戴此盔甲时，你不能被不情愿地击倒{@condition prone}，并且你无视库沙拉达奥拉和阿玛松的风障等效果。

items.name: T.Miralis Scale
entries: 你的武器会造成额外的1d8的砍击伤害。

items.name: T.Miralis Fireclaw
entries: 你的武器会造成额外的1d8火焰伤害。

items.name: T.Immortal Heart
entries: Whenever you cast a spell of 1st-level or higher, lava erupts from the ground around you. any creature within 5 feet of you takes {@damage 2d8} points of fire damage. Also when you cast a spell that deals fire damage, it deals extra damage equal to 2 times the spells level as fire damage.

items.name: T.Miralis Smelter
entries: This weapon has 4 runes that it regains daily at dawn. When you hit a creature with this weapon, you can expend a rune to have it make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target has disadvantage on all attack rolls against targets other than you until the end of your next turn.

items.name: T.Miralis Hellwing
entries: {@i (Spellcaster only)} This weapon has 7 runes. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its runes to cast the {@spell fireball} spell (save {@dc 16}) from it. For 1 rune, you cast the 3rd-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional rune you expend.
此武器每天在黎明时分恢复1d6+1个已消耗的符文。如果你消耗了武器的最后一个符文，掷一个D20。在1的情况下，符文在一周内不能再充能。

items.name: T.Miralis Evil Eye
entries: {@i Elderseal.} 被此武器击中的生物不能使用有充能的动作，直到你下一回合开始。该生物仍然可以在其回合结束时翻滚以充能其能力。

items.name: T.Dire Dragongem
entries: {@i Latent Power +2.}当你在战斗中第一次被降低到最大命中率的一半时，或者在战斗的第10轮开始时，以先到者为准，你会获得{@spell haste}的法术效果，持续1分钟。一旦使用，你必须完成一次短时或长时的休息才能再次使用此属性。

monster.name: Tempered Fatalis

trait.name: Hellfire
entries: Fire damage dealt by Fatalis bypasses fire resistance and deals half damage to creatures that are immune to fire damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Fatalis fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Fatalis has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Mythic Creature
entries: Fatalis counts as a number of creatures equal to it's mythic multiplier (2) for the purposes of determining combat encounters. The XP value for Fatalis is multiplied by it's mythic multiplier.

trait.name: World Ender (Mythic Trait; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When Fatalis is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, Fatalis regains 700 hit points and gains 200 temporary hit points. In addition it gains the following benefits and changes:

items: Its Hellfire trait now bypasses a creature immunity and resistance to fire damage.
It regains up to two expended legendary resistances uses.
Creature's are no longer immune to Fatalis's Frightful Presence, until they succeed on the saving throw or the effect ends again. Its Frightful Presence save DC is increased by 2.

When a creature makes a melee weapon attack against Fatalis and misses by 5 or more, that creature becomes stuck to the Fatalis's chest. While stuck in this way the creature is {@condition restrained} (Escape {@dc 23}). On Fatalis's turn, if a creature is stuck to it, Fatalis can use a bonus action to make a bite attack against the creature and throw it 15 feet away into an unoccupied space.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fatalis can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws; or it uses its fireballs.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the fatalis's choice that is within 120 feet of the fatalis and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 24} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the fatalis's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d10 + 10}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d6 + 10}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, 20 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 27} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Fireballs
entries: The fatalis exhales three fireballs at different points it can see within within 120 feet of its location. Each creature in a 10-foot radius Sphere centered on a point must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 ({@damage 9d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that is hit by more than one fireball takes no additional damage, but makes their saving throw at disadvantage.

action.name: Hellfire Breath {@recharge 6}
entries: The Fatalis exhales hellfire in a 120-foot cone in front of it. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 ({@damage 26d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

mythicHeader: When the Fatalis' mythic trait is activated, it takes flight, without provoking attacks of opportunity, and hovers 600 feet above the ground before releasing a gout of hellfire in a 600-foot line that is 10 feet wide. When the hellfire hit a creature or object it spreads out in a 150-foot radius. A creature that starts its turn in the flames must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage on a failed saved or half as much damage on a successful one.

On subsequent turns, while the Fatalis's temporary hit points are above 0, Fatalis can't move from the space it is in and must use its action to maintain the gout of flames. As part of the same action Fatalis can change the direction of the hellfire. When Fatalis's temporary hit points are reduced to 0, it flinches and the gout of hellfire ends.

On the Fatalis's 5th turn, if it is still exhaling hellfire, it must use its action to release one final empowered gout of flames. Each creature in the flames area must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 196 ({@damage 56d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The final gout of flames ignite flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried, and it begins to melt all cover and parts of structures in the flames area.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Fatalis makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: Fatalis makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Trample (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Fatalis moves up to its speed, during this move it can move through other creatures without provoking attacks of opportunity. Any creatures Fatalis moves through must succeed on a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw or take 32 ({@damage 4d10 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Large Fireball (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The fatalis exhales a monstrous sized fireball at a point it can see within within 120 feet of its location. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 13d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
在传说中，据说所有的生物都害怕法塔里斯，包括其他长老龙，如（%0%）和（%1%）。据说所有的怪物都会不惜一切代价避开法塔利斯，导致一些怪物为了避开它而离开这里。

Fatalis是一种强大的、非自然的野兽。法塔利斯的鳞片非常厚，而它的外壳则非常耐用。这是由于法塔利斯将其倒下的猎物的盔甲融化在它的壳上，增加了它对某些攻击的保护。Fatalis似乎没有很好的视力，尽管这可能部分是由于它的眼睛是由什么构成的。令人毛骨悚然的是，Fatalis的眼睛是由水晶制成的。怎么做的不得而知。Fatalis的翼膜是灵活的，但像金属一样硬。由此可见，Fatalis的翅膀不容易折断，使它能够高速飞行，并在空中支撑自己。即使在地面上，Fatalis也能四肢着地，以惊人的速度冲向猎物，其体型背后的力量令人震惊。最强大的特征是它强大的火热气息。这种火是所有怪物中最强的火息，几乎可以瞬间杀死大多数敌人。最近的遭遇表明，法塔利斯拥有与泰奥斯特拉和（%0%）一样的对火的控制。它的火息远远超出了这只已经很大的龙的长度和高度。

在一些关于法塔利斯的传说中，有一个被一些人称为命运天平变动的传说。这个传说声称，法塔利斯的第二次降临是无限的。这个传说中的法塔利斯与其他传说中看到的法塔利斯有很大不同。这个法塔利斯被描述为有六个角，一个发光的蓝色胸部，在它的尖刺之间有一个短的鬃毛，奇异的液体流经它的身体，并且有能力将它的鳞片从黑色、红色或白色转变。据说每套鳞片都能赋予法塔利斯不同的能力和保护。这些技能中最知名的是黑焰和深红恶魔的气息，据说它们将火和死亡元素结合在一起，尽管两者结合在一起的元素相同，但每一种气息都有不同的元素，似乎超越了这个法塔利斯的身体，使它能够做其他传说中没有的事情。据说这个Fatalis只要扇动一下翅膀，就能让怪物跑掉。

它的眼睛发出令人毛骨悚然的光，吸引着它盯着的人进入其黑暗的深处。据说这些液体没有确切的重量。它的外壳不受武器的打击，里面有可怕的力量，随时可以释放出来。这个传说最可怕的地方在于，它的力量不仅远远超过其他传说中的力量，而且它的身体还显示出可能有再生能力的迹象。这意味着这个Fatalis也许能够在受到大量伤害后再生，就像Dire Miralis能够从其仍然跳动的心脏中再生一样。值得庆幸的是，这个传说到目前为止还没有被证实，所以公会没有什么可担心的。

关于Fatalis，所有传奇都有一个共同点，就是它的装备。这种装备远比它表面上看起来的要多。当冒险者穿上这种怪物的盔甲时，据说他们会神秘地消失得无影无踪，如果盔甲穿得太久甚至会死亡。一些穿了Fatalis盔甲的人报告说，他们做了可怕的噩梦，有令人不安的力量，并有一种仿佛被什么东西附身的感觉。他们还报告说感觉到一种来自盔甲的熟悉的脉搏，一种仿佛他们的腿被夺走的感觉。一些穿着黑焰盔甲的冒险者报告说，他们感觉自己的身体在昏迷时被人接管了。据说这种装备可能还活着，这意味着法塔里斯可能并没有真正死去。在波克村，人们知道嵌入冰中的巨大黑刀在被开采一次后几天就会再生，这支持了法塔里斯仍然活着的这种说法。其他Fatalis武器似乎也表明Fatalis仍然以某种形式活着。一些武器会绝望地吞噬使用者的双手，而其他武器，当被握住时，会发出狰狞的深渊般的尖叫。有些武器甚至对血有一种渴求。由此可见，最好不要以任何形式使用来自Fatalis的任何装备。

Fatalis对所有生物都有极大的敌意。它不仅威胁到施拉德城堡的生存，而且威胁到它周围的世界。在传说中，据说Fatalis可以在几天内用它的火焰烧毁整个世界，将所有土地烧成灰烬。由于这个原因，公会会秘密派遣冒险者去追捕它，以防止公众恐慌。然而，大多数冒险者都没有回来。由于围绕施拉德王国和法塔利斯的许多事件，冒险家协会将有关这两者的一切都归类为远离公众。法塔利斯的盔甲和任务只允许给那些已经证明他们相当可信的人。

items.name: Fatalis B.Scale
entries: 当你穿上这件盔甲时，你对毒药伤害有抵抗力，对酸液伤害有免疫力。

items.name: Fatalis R.Scale
entries: 你对火灾伤害有免疫力，在你穿上这件盔甲时，你对{@condition poisoned}的状况有免疫力。

items.name: Fatalis W.Scale
entries: 你对寒冷伤害有免疫力，在你穿上这个盔甲时，你不能被（%0%）。

items.name: Fatalis Shell
entries: {@i Evade Window+.} 这个盔甲有5个符文，每天在黎明时分恢复1d5个已消耗的符文。当你穿着它的时候，你的灵巧救赎失败，你可以用你的反应来消耗它的一个符文来代替救赎成功。

items.name: Fatalis Webbing
entries: 当你穿上这件盔甲时，你的体质得分是24。如果你的体质分数已经达到24或更高，它对你没有影响。

items.name: Fatalis Fellwing
entries: {@i (Paladin & Cleric only)}你可以在两次休息之间额外使用你的通道神性功能。

items.name: Fatalis Cortex
entries: {@i Stellar Hunter.}你在灵巧（{@skill Stealth}）、智力（{@skill Investigation}）、力量（{@skill Athletics}）、智慧（{@skill Insight}）和智慧（{@skill Survival}）的检查中具有优势。

items.name: Fatalis Horn
entries: {@i Wellness.}穿戴此盔甲时，你不能被不情愿地投入睡眠，{@condition poisoned}，{@condition paralyzed}，或{@condition stunned}。

items.name: Fatalis Eye
entries: {@i Dark Finale.}当你的命中率降至0但没有被彻底杀死时，你可以使用你的反应来被法塔利斯的邪恶能量附身，并发生以下情况。

items: 你的治疗效果达到你的最大命中率。
你的眼睛发着红光，一个黑色的光环包裹着你的身体。
在你每个回合开始时，你会受到10({@damage 1d20})的尸毒伤害。这种伤害会绕过抵抗力和免疫力，并且无法通过任何方式减少或避免。
你获得了一个+2的AC奖励，并且你在所有的拯救动作上都有优势。
你无法通过正常或魔法手段得到治疗。

entries: 当你的命中率再次降至0时，你的两次死亡救赎会自动失败，附身结束。

items.name: Fatalis B.Scale
entries: {@i (Melee Weapon only)}当你用此武器攻击一个生物，并在攻击卷上掷出20，该目标会受到额外的{@damage 4d6}酸性伤害。然后再掷一个D20。如果你掷出20，目标的一个肢体就会溶解，这种损失的效果由GM决定。如果该生物没有肢体可供溶解，你将溶解其身体的一部分。

items.name: Fatalis R.Scale
entries: 在持有此武器时，你可以使用一个动作说出武器的指令词，并为每个生物召唤一个（%0%）和1d4个（%1%），就像你施展了（%2%）法术一样。

items.name: Fatalis W.Scale
entries: 这把武器有5个符文，每天在黎明时分重新获得。当你用这个武器击中一个生物时，你可以消耗1个符文，让这个生物做一个{@dc 21}体质测试。如果救赎失败，目标会在1分钟内被冰冻到骨头。在寒冷的时候，他们在所有的攻击卷和能力检查中都处于劣势，而且他们的速度会降低10英尺。一个生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复它的救赎动作，如果成功则结束该效果。

items.name: Fatalis Shell
entries: {@i Rapid Reload.}当你与此武器相适应时，你可以作为一个自由动作重新装弹。此外，当你进行远程武器攻击卷，并在攻击卷中掷出20分时，你可以作为自由行动进行一次额外的攻击。

items.name: Fatalis Webbing
entries: {@i Critical Eye+2.}你的武器攻击关键命中范围增加3。

items.name: Fatalis Fellwing
entries: 这把武器可以作为你施法的奥术焦点。当你持有这把武器时，你可以施放一个通常需要行动的四级或以下的法术，作为一个额外的行动。

items.name: Fatalis Cortex
entries: 当持有此武器时，它会在你周围10英尺的范围内产生一个光环。你和光环中所有对你友好的生物在对抗法术和其他魔法效果时都有优势。如果你有17级或以上的圣骑士等级，光环的半径会增加到30英尺。

items.name: Fatalis Horn
entries: {@i Blazing Majesty.}作为一个额外动作，你可以激活这个被称为炽热恩典的武器属性，持续1分钟。当炽热恩典处于激活状态时，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你可以使用一个动作从武器中随意施放（%0%）（（%1%）），不需要任何材料成分。
你的武器会造成额外的{@damage 2d6}火焰伤害。
你可以对任何武器使用{@item hammer|AGMH}的{@optfeature Mighty Weapon|AGMH}属性一次。

entries: 一旦你使用这个属性，你就不能再使用它，直到下一个黎明。

items.name: Fatalis Eye
entries: {@i Mind's Eye+.}你用此武器的攻击能绕过任何生物的伤害抵抗和免疫。

items.name: Dark Stone
entries: {@i (Trinket only)}当插入一个饰品时，你开始听到来自它的沙哑的声音。当你花几个小时盯着饰品听他们的低语时，说出一个你认识但你以前从未对其使用过这种能力的人。然后，掷出2d6+2。

items.name: On a 10+
items.entry: 这个饰品揭示了关于他们的一个秘密。

items.name: On a 7-9
items.entry: 如同10+，但你必须先向小饰品透露一个关于你的希望、恐惧、遗憾或欲望的秘密。

items.name: On a 6-
items.entry: 饰品是你心中的一个秘密。

entries: 每当小饰品透露出一个秘密，就在一个盒子上做标记。
当你在最后一个盒子上做记号时，你就会解开饰品的神秘面纱，可以使用（%0%）。

entries.name: SHADOW MAGIC
entries: 当你持有这个饰品并召唤里面的阴影时，选择以下一项作为行动，并掷出2d6+2。

items.name: On a 7-9
items.entry: 如同10+，但你要承受GM选择的以下后果之一，如果他们选择了一个。

items.name: On a 6-
items.entry: 这个饰品不再起作用，直到它被垂死的呼吸所抚摸。

entries.name: ACTIONS
items: 你将自己笼罩在阴影和寂静中，持续1分钟，就像被{@spell invisibility}和{@spell silence}的法术所影响。只要你不引起别人的注意，并避开太阳或圣光，就能在无形中移动，不被人注意到。
说出你认识的人或与你有神秘联系的人（头发、衣服等）。在接下来的24小时内，你可以看到他们，听到他们，和他们说悄悄话，就像从附近的影子里一样。
选择一个你能看到的在你60英尺范围内的生物。该生物必须在一个{@dc 17}的力量救赎中成功，否则就会被周围的阴影所困住。被阴影抓住的生物可以用它的行动对你的智力({@skill Athletics})检查做一个有争议的力量检查。如果成功，它就会释放自己。

entries.name: CONSEQUENCES
items: 你所使用的饰品中的黑暗灵体逃脱了，在这个世界上显现出来。划掉刚刚使用的影子魔法选项，直到精神被强迫或说服回到饰品中。
你的眼睛变成漆黑色。在昏暗的光线和黑暗中，你有{@sense truesight}到120英尺的距离，但你看不到任何颜色，并被阳光刺瞎。
你的皮肤会变成死一般的苍白或煤黑色（由你选择），触之生寒。你对寒冷伤害有免疫力，但你在所有的社会交往检查中都处于劣势。此外，阳光会灼伤你的皮肤，你在阳光下每10分钟就会受到{@damage 1d4}的火焰伤害。
你开始受到黑暗和困扰的梦的困扰。当你进行长时间休息时，请进行一次智慧救赎。如果救赎失败，你就不能获得长期休息的好处，而且你所做的恶梦可能会暴露出一个有用的秘密。
饰品中的灵体在你的灵魂中购买。每天一次，这些灵体可以强迫你行动，就像用{@spell command}的咒语一样。当他们这样做的时候，你必须成功地进行一次{@dc 15}的智慧拯救。如果救赎失败，你就会听从鬼魂的命令。如果你的救赎失败5次或更多，你就会倒下（2%），并且鬼魂会控制你的身体1d4小时。当你醒来时，你对自己所做的事情没有记忆。

entries.name: Cursed
entries: 这种材料是被诅咒的。与它相配会使你受到诅咒，直到你被{@spell greater restoration}或{@spell wish}的咒语锁定。只要你还被诅咒，你就不愿意离开这个饰品，并一直将它带在身上。
一旦诅咒被打破，你就不再与饰品相适应，你不再受到任何后果的影响，你也不能再与饰品相适应。

trait.name: Control Lightning
entries: 麒麟可以选择其30英尺内的任何地点作为{@spell lightning bolt}法术的起始地点。

trait.name: Elder Seal Susceptibility
entries: When the kirin is hit by a weapon that has the elder seal material, its AC is reduced by 3 until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Fulgurmancer
entries: The kirin has advantage on Concentration checks to maintain concentration on a spell. Additionally, when a creature fails their saving throw against a spell that deals lightning damage on a turn, that creature is afflicted with {@condition thunderblight|MHMM} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the kirin fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 麒麟对法术和其他魔法效果的救赎有优势。

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: 麒麟的武器攻击是神奇的。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kirin makes three attacks. two with its hooves and one with its horn.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Horn
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: 麒麟做了一个智慧（（%0%））检查。

legendary.name: Smite
entries: 麒麟做出一个蹄子攻击或施放（%0%）。

legendary.name: Move
entries: 麒麟的移动速度达到其半速，不会引起机会攻击。

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kirin casts a spell from its list of known spells, using a spell slot as normal.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kirin's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells  (spell save {@dc 20}), requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kirin is a 20th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. The kirin has the following spells prepared:

entries: 麒麟类似于独角兽，尽管仔细观察会发现它身上覆盖的是鳞片而不是外衣。它雄伟的白色鬃毛和头发竖起来，仿佛带着静电。这只怪物经常发出杂散电流的噼啪声。
麒麟有白色的毛皮，用于吸收电流。当毛皮中的电流足够多时，麒麟就会发出亮光，它的皮毛可以抵御大多数攻击。由此，冒险家协会认为，麒麟的高代谢率也有助于它吸收电流。麒麟最重要的特征是它的长角。这个角被用来从天空中召唤闪电，即使在没有暴风云的情况下，也能打击任何威胁到它的敌人。然而，即使这个角被毁，麒麟仍然可以不费吹灰之力地召唤出闪电。
一些比较罕见的、年长的、或者只是比较强壮的个体，以拥有异常强大的电力量而闻名，这些力量还没有被完全理解。一些更大、更强的肌肉位于其腿部，能够发出致命的踢击。装备了如此强大的腿，所有麒麟都拥有以意想不到的速度奔跑的能力，它们似乎是在传送，留下了一串蓝色的电流。
麒麟是一个非常难以预测的物种。麒麟有时很平静，有时则很有攻击性。在一个传说中，据说一只麒麟居然用它的电力力量摧毁了整个村庄。

items.name: T.Kirin Hide
entries: {@i Marathon Runner+.}穿戴此盔甲时，你的行走速度增加10英尺，如果不是由魔法效果造成的，你可以忽略困难的地形。

items.name: T.Kirin Mane
entries: {@i Control Lightning.} 每当你施放一个造成闪电伤害的圆锥或直线法术时，你可以选择你30英尺内的任何地点作为起始地点。

items.name: T.Kirin Tail
entries: {@i Divine Blessing+2.} When you take damage you are not immune or resistant to, roll a d8 and reduce the damage you take by the number rolled. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier. You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

items.name: T.Kirin Thunderhorn
entries: You have resistance to thunder damage and can't be {@condition paralyzed} while you wear this armor.

items.name: T.Kirin Azure Horn
entries: 当你穿上这件盔甲时，你对雷电伤害有免疫力。

items.name: T.Kirin Hide
entries: 你的武器会造成额外的1d8雷电伤害。

items.name: T.Kirin Mane
entries: This weapon has 3 runes which are regained every day at dawn. When you hit a creature with this weapon, you may expend a rune to have the target make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a fail, the creature is {@condition incapacitated} and has its movement speed is reduced to 0 for 1 minute. The creature may repeat its saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the effect on a success.

items.name: T.Kirin Tail
entries: {@i Critical Status (thunderblight).} When you hit a creature with a weapon or spell that deals lightning or thunder damage, and roll a 20 for the attack roll, the creature is afflicted with {@condition thunderblight|MHMM} for 1 minute. A creature can make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: T.Kirin Thunderhorn
entries: When you cast a spell that deals lightning damage, you gain a +3 bonus to its spell attack roll or you increase the spell save DC by 3.

items.name: T.Kirin Azure Horn
entries: {@i (Spellcaster only)} This weapon has 7 runes. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its runes to cast the {@spell call lightning} spell (save {@dc 16}) from it. For 1 rune, you cast the 3rd-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional rune you expend.
此武器每天在黎明时分恢复1d6+1个已消耗的符文。如果你消耗了武器的最后一个符文，掷一个D20。在1的情况下，符文在一周内不能再充能。

items.name: Elder Dragon Blood
entries: 任何稀有的武器升级材料。

items.name: Elder Dragon Bone
entries: 任何稀有的装甲升级材料。

entries.name: T.Kirin Material Bonus
entries: When a character has three T.kirin materials socketed into their equipment they gain the {@i Tempered Kirin Favor} bonus.

{@b Kirin Favor.} You have have advantage on carve checks. Additionally when you roll on a creature's loot table, you can choose to reroll it and take the new roll. Once you use this bonus, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the tempered lunastra moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a Bite attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Fire Aura
entries: At the start of each of the tempered lunastra's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches the tempered lunastra or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Goddess of the Blue Flame
entries: Fire damage dealt by the the tempered lunastra ignores fire resistance.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the tempered lunastra fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tempered lunastra makes three attacks; two claw attacks and one bite or one tail attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. On hit, the target must make a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Blue Flame Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The tempered lunastra exhales blue flames in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

action.name: Deadly Leap
entries: If the tempered lunastra jumps at least 10 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked {@condition prone} and take 19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage + 19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) fire damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked {@condition prone}, and is pushed 5 feet out of the tempered lunastra's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is with in range, the creature instead falls {@condition prone} in the lunastra's space.

action.name: Supernova Pulse (1/day)
entries: The tempered lunastra beats its wings rising 20 feet into the air and releases a large burst of blue flames all around it. Each creature within 45 feet of the tempered lunastra must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) fire damage.

For the next 3 rounds, at the start of the tempered lunastra's turn, the blue flames pulse around her in a 30-foot radius. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 13 ({@damage 3d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The tempered lunastra moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The tempered lunastra makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Devil's Powder (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The tempered lunastra beats its wings releasing an explosive powder and creating a spark with her teeth. Each creature within 20 feet of the tempered lunastra must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage plus 16 ({@damage 3d10}) force damage  and be knocked {@condition prone}.
露娜斯特拉的颜色是蓝色的，而{@creature Teostra|MHMM}则是红色的。她的角更扁更宽，形成一种冠状结构。众所周知，它们能喷出集中的火流，并将自己笼罩在一个灼热的光环中。鲁纳斯特拉在食物链中的地位很高，既以煤为食，以激发她的火力能力，也以活的猎物为食，如（1%）。虽然鲁纳斯特拉很强大，但它们必须与其他物种竞争，如（2%）、（3%）和（4%）。

作为火龙，Lunastra自然拥有对火的专业控制。它们可以在狩猎时使用这种能力，以确保快速和毁灭性的杀戮。尽管她的体型很大，但她的脚步很快，可以轻松地追赶快速移动的猎物。露娜斯特拉还能从他们的角上在身体周围产生火光环，这有助于防止像（%0%）这样厚颜无耻的怪物对他们造成严重伤害。这些适应性使Lunastra无论在哪里都能成为一个强大的顶级捕食者。它们的翅膀上覆盖着一种粉末，可以释放出来，并随意在空气中燃起火焰，导致爆炸。这种爆炸性粉末实际上是Lunastra的旧皮肤。

Lunastra are brutal female elder dragons, quick to attack at the first sign of trouble, though not as much as Teostra. In the ruins of the old Towers, Lunastra are commonly found in their nest together with Teostra. This suggest that both actually stay in the nest together and guard their young. Though both haven't been seen in the nest together, both of their footprints can be found in the old nests and the active nests together.

items.name: T.Lunastra Scale
entries: {@i Tool Specialist.}当穿着这件盔甲时，你的熟练度加成是双倍的，用于你精通的工具的任何能力检查。

items.name: T.Lunastra Carapace
entries: While you wear this armor, any creature that touches you or hits you with a melee weapon attack takes {@damage 1d8} fire damage.

items.name: T.Lunastra Tail
entries: 当你穿上这件盔甲时，你对火灾伤害有豁免权。

items.name: T.Lunastra Wing
entries: {@i Wide-Range+.}当你使用{@table plants|AGMH|Herbs}、{@item Antidote|AGMH}s、{@item Cool Drink|AGMH}s、{@item Hot Drink|AGMH}s、{@table plants|AGMH|Adamant Seeds, or Might Seeds}时；你周围20英尺范围内的其他生物都会获得其效果。

items.name: T.Lunastra Horn
entries: {@i Health Boost+.}在穿戴此盔甲时，你的角色等级每提高一个，你的最大命中率就会增加2。

items.name: T.Lunastra Gem
entries: {@i Fiery Protection.} While wearing this armor you have immunity to poison damage and the {@condition poisoned} condition. Also when you would gain a level of {@condition exhaustion}, you can choose to ignore it. Once you use this property you can't use it until the next dawn.

items.name: T.Lunastra Scale
entries: {@i Guard.}当你挥舞此武器时，你不能被推倒或撞倒。

items.name: T.Lunastra Carapace
entries: {@i Critical Eye+.}你的武器攻击关键命中范围增加2。

items.name: T.Lunastra Tail
entries: 你的武器会造成额外的1d8火焰伤害。

items.name: T.Lunastra Wing
entries: When you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack using this weapon, you can engulf the target in flames. At the start of each of the engulfed creature's turns, it takes {@damage 1d6} fire damage and it can then make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, putting out the flames on a successful save. Alternatively, the engulfed creature, or a creature within 5 feet of it, can use an action to smother the flames ending the effect. Once used, this property can't be used again until you finish a short or long rest.

items.name: T.Lunastra Mane
entries: {@i Elderseal.} 被此武器击中的生物不能使用有充能的动作，直到你下一回合开始。该生物仍然可以在其回合结束时翻滚以充能其能力。

items.name: T.Lunastra Horn
entries: {@i Awaken.}当这种材料被放置在不造成冷、火、闪电、坏死或雷电伤害的武器中时，它在击中时将会滚动一个额外的伤害模子。例如，短剑现在滚动2d6，大剑造成3d6。

items.name: T.Lunastra Gem
entries: While holding this weapon your spell attack rolls and spell save DC increase by +2. If the spell deals fire damage, the bonus is increased to +3.

items.name: Elder Dragon Blood
entries: 任何稀有的武器升级材料。

items.name: Elder Dragon Bone
entries: 任何稀有的装甲升级材料。

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: 纳米勒可以呼吸空气和水。

trait.name: Flooded
entries: Any space that has been flooded by one of namielle's actions is filled with three to four feet of water, and it is difficult terrain for any creature without a innate or magical swimming speed. The flooded areas remain flooded for 24 hours, until the namielle absorbs the water, or until it is turned to steam.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: 如果Namielle的拯救动作失败，它可以选择成功。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: namielle的先天法术能力是智力。它可以天生施展以下法术，不需要任何物质成分。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 纳米勒会进行两次攻击：一次用它的咬，一次用它的爪，或者用它的水球进行两次攻击。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, Reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, Reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Water Globule
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw, or become affected with {@disease waterblight|MHMM} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a hit or miss, the 5 foot area below the target is flooded.

action.name: Tidal Wave
entries: The namielle conjures up a wave of water that crashes down on an area in front of it. The area can be up to 40 feet long, up to 10 feet wide, and up to 10 feet tall. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one. The water then spreads out 15 feet across the ground in all directions, flooding the area.

action.name: Maelstrom
entries: The water in a 40-foot radius around the namielle is pulled towards it and absorbed into its body, increasing its AC by 3 until the end of its next turn. Each creature in flooded terrain must make a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or take 24 ({@damage 7d6}) bludgeoning damage and be pulled 10 feet toward the namielle on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one and is not pulled.

action.name: Electric Divebomb {@recharge 5}
entries: The namielle releases a torrent of water from its body, flooding the ground in a 35-foot radius around it. It then rises into the sky while gathering electricity and comes crashing down at its same location causing a massive eruption of water and a shockwave of steam. Each creature within 40 feet of the namielle must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 5d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. If the creature is within 15 feet of the namielle, it takes an extra 16 ({@damage 3d10}) lightning damage.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: 纳米勒用它的咬合或水球进行一次攻击。

legendary.name: Water Beam (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The namielle exhales a torrent of water in an 90-foot cone, flooding the area. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) cold damage and be affected with {@disease waterblight|MHMM} on a failed save, or half as much damage and not affected with {@disease waterblight|MHMM} on a successful one. The water then spreads out 15 feet across the ground in all directions, flooding the area.

legendary.name: Electric Current (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The namielle touches the tip of its wing to a flooded space within 10 feet of it, sending an electric current coursing through it. This current travels through each connected flooded space causing an explosion of steam in each space as it travels through them. Each creature in those spaces must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. Spaces affected by this ability then lose the flooded status.
纳米勒是一只长老龙，具有鳐鱼、深海鱼和水母的特征。它巨大的翅膀上面是黑色的，下面是浅蓝色的，有彩虹般的发光，不断地跳动。它的头部是红色和蓝色的，有同样的脉冲发光，但当它的水被抽干后，它的身体和翅膀的底部都有一种乳白色的褐色。它的下颚也有多根长须。
与大多数长老龙一样，大多数怪物只要一出现就会逃走。它宣称自己是食物链的顶端。然而，它消费的是什么，是一个谜。根据它的针状牙齿结构，可以推测它是以鱼为食的，也可能是以鱼腥草为食的翼龙。只有其他长老龙和最近发现的{@creature Savage Deviljho|MHMM}，其中的蛮牛狼人能够与它的力量相当，似乎愿意挑战它。
纳米勒是一只非常独特的长老龙，它的身体带有海洋中发现的各种生物的影子。它的翅膀类似于鳐鱼的翅膀，而翅膀的尖端可以像电鳗一样放电。它的翅膀的薄膜和脸部的一部分会发出生物发光的光，并随着彩虹颜色的变化而跳动，它有像深海鱼一样的大针状牙齿。它的翅膀上还有像梳子水母一样的梳子，使其进一步发出生物荧光。然而，它最引人注目的特点是它能够生产、控制和吸收水。
然而，所说的水似乎并不是纯水，而是它内部的唾液和水混合在一起，形成一种粘液状的水，可以粘附并长时间保持湿润。这种水从它的嘴里射出，可以自由地吸收回去，只要它挥动一下翅膀或前爪，就可以使站在这种水上的猎人随意地来回滑动。它还可以将这种水射向地面，导致潮水涌起。更有趣的是，Namielle实际上可以产生电力，并利用闪电使它的水拍通电，然后猛烈地爆炸成蒸汽。
Namielle相当独特的地方是，它即使勉强拍打翅膀也能飞行，并像鳐鱼在水中那样在空中滑行。纳米勒还似乎有能力用它的身体遮住太阳，从而造成瞬间的黑暗。然而，应该注意的是，这种能力只是在最初发现它时表现出来。

items.name: T.Namielle Finehide
entries: {@i Tool Specialist.}当穿着这件盔甲时，你的熟练度加成是双倍的，用于你精通的工具的任何能力检查。

items.name: T.Namielle Hardclaw
entries: {@i Biology.}当你穿着这件盔甲时，你会变得精通{@item dung bomb|AGMH}，而且你对{@condition waterblight|MHMM}、{@condition iceblight|MHMM}或{@spell blight}咒语等枯萎效果免疫。

items.name: T.Namielle Whisker
entries: {@i Constitution.}当你穿上这件盔甲时，来自减速效果的持续时间，如{@spell slow}咒语或铜龙的呼吸攻击，会减少一半。

items.name: T.Namielle Fellwing
entries: {@i Stamina Surge+2.}穿戴此盔甲时，你可以使用行动从它身上施放{@spell haste}的咒语，每天一次，但施放时只能以自己为目标，咒语结束时你会获得1级的{@condition exhaustion}。

items.name: T.Namielle Lash
entries: 这件盔甲有3个符文，每天在黎明时分恢复1d3个消耗的符文。当你穿上它时，你可以使用一个行动并消耗1个符文，使盔甲显示出一种变幻莫测的耀眼色调，直到你下一回合结束。在这段时间内，盔甲在30英尺范围内发出亮光，在另外30英尺范围内发出暗光。能看到你的生物在对你进行攻击时有劣势。此外，当盔甲的力量被激活时，任何在强光下能看到你的生物都必须在一个{@dc 15}的智慧救赎中成功，否则会变成{@condition stunned}，直到效果结束。

items.name: T.Namielle Mantle
entries: While wearing this armor you have resistance to cold damage and lightning damage.

items.name: T.Namielle Finehide
entries: 当与此武器相适应时，你可以使用一个动作对自己随意施放（%0%）的法术。

items.name: T.Namielle Hardclaw
entries: 当你与此武器相适应时，你可以使用一个额外的行动来随意施放（%0%）的法术。

items.name: T.Namielle Whisker
entries: 当你用此武器重伤时，目标在下一回合开始前不能做出反应。

items.name: T.Namielle Fellwing
entries: 当你完成短期或长期休息时，你选择一种伤害类型。这个伤害类型可以是寒冷或雷电伤害。被该武器击中的生物会额外承受1d8的所选伤害类型。

items.name: T.Namielle Lash
entries: {@i (Spellcaster only)} This weapon has 10 runes. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its runes to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC: {@spell shape water|XGE} (1 rune), {@spell create or destroy water} (1 rune), {@spell fog cloud} (1 rune), {@spell call lightning} (3 runes) or {@spell control water} (4 runes). The weapon regains 1d6 + 4 expended runes daily at dawn. If you expend the last rune it cannot regain any runes for one week.

items.name: T.Namielle Mantle
entries: You gain a + 2 bonus to your spell attack rolls and spell save DC while attuned to this weapon. This bonus increases to +3 when the spell you are casting deals cold or lightning damage.

items.name: Elder Dragon Blood
entries: 任何稀有的武器升级材料。

items.name: Elder Dragon Bone
entries: 任何稀有的装甲升级材料。

trait.name: Fire Aura
entries: At the start of each of the teostra's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches the teostra or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Explosive Cloud
entries: At the start of the teostra's turn, it beats its wings and four clouds of explosive powder appear in unoccupied 5-foot cubes of air within 60 feet of the teostra. Additionally every 15 feet the teostra moves, it leaves a cloud of explosive powder in a 5-foot cube. The clouds remain until detonation, until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it, or when the teostra dies.
As a Bonus action, the teostra can move up to three of these clouds 20 feet in any direction.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the teostra fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The teostra's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The teostra makes three attacks: two with its claw and one with its bite or tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. On hit, the target must make a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Deadly Leap
entries: If the teostra jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked {@condition prone} and take 33 ({@damage 6d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked {@condition prone}, and is pushed 5 feet out of the teostra's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is with in range, the creature instead falls {@condition prone} in the teostra's space.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The teostra exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 38 ({@damage 11d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

action.name: Supernova (1/day)
entries: The teostra beats its wings rising 20 feet into the air and releases a large burst of fire all around it. Each creature within a 40-foot-radius sphere of the teostra must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 ({@damage 14d8}) fire damage and are pushed back 10 feet on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one and not pushed back.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The teostra moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The teostra makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Detonate (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: All Explosive Clouds detonate and burst into flames. Each creature within 10-feet of a explosive cloud must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one. If a creature is within range of more than one explosive cloud, they take an additional 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage for each additional cloud.

Teostra is a dragon with leonine features and a fiery coloration. It has a grand mane, large fangs, and a pair of horns that curve backward. Its wings are covered in fur. Teostra is the male counterpart to Lunastra. Being predatory Elder Dragons Teostra are powerful top predators and are easily capable of killing weaker animals such as {@creature Aptonoth|MHMM}, {@creature Conga|MHMM}, {@creature Bulldrome|MHMM}, {@creature Iodrome|MHMM}, {@creature Apceros|MHMM}, and {@creature Cephadrome|MHMM}. Armed with razor sharp claws and flesh ripping teeth these Elder Dragons make short work of prey and smaller predators.

Possessing mastery over flame, there are few creatures that can hope to last against Teostra for long. To defend itself, the Teostra also utilizes a heat shield which damages enemies that get too close. To keep its flame powers going, they consume coal in volcanic environments. It also has detachable wing scales or powder that explode when ignited from a spark made when Teostra bites. It uses these to defend itself from attackers, although they give little protection against enemies with resilience to extreme heat such as {@creature Akantor|MHMM} or {@creature Lavasioth|MHMM}.

Teostra can even use the powder for many close range attacks but more skilled Teostra have learnt to use the powder at long range. When Teostra angered, it will fly into the air and ignite the powder all at once. When the powder is all ignited, Teostra will be covered in a large burst of fire, that is sometimes referred to as the Supernova.

Some extremely rare individuals have more control over their flaming powers than {@creature teostra|MHMM|most}. They have a different appearance also including more yellow wing webbing, a more reddish mane, red claws, orange tail end and golden eyes. New flame techniques include leaving pockets of explosive powder across the area in the air as it fights and setting them all a flame at will.

Teostra are a very aggressive monster. It will show dominance to anything that it encounters. Compared to Lunastra, who give warnings to get out of its territory, Teostra will ruthlessly attack intruders until they are dead. As one of the most aggressive Elder Dragons, Teostra are highly feared. It is not advised to go out into the Desert, Volcano, Swamp, or Tower when pairing with {@creature Lunastra|MHMM}, as the prospect of fighting both Lunastra and Teostra together is often considered suicidal.

items.name: T.Fire Dragon Scale
entries: {@i Biology.}当你穿着这件盔甲时，你会变得精通{@item dung bomb|AGMH}，而且你对{@condition waterblight|MHMM}、{@condition iceblight|MHMM}或{@spell blight}咒语等枯萎效果免疫。

items.name: T.Teostra Carapace
entries: While wearing this armor you can use an action to cast the {@spell protection from energy} (fire) spell from it. This property can be used three times, regaining all expended uses daily at dawn.

items.name: T.Teostra Webbing
entries: While wearing this armor you have immunity to fire damage.

items.name: T.Teostra Horn
entries: {@i Wide-Range+.}当你使用{@table plants|AGMH|Herbs}、{@item Antidote|AGMH}s、{@item Cool Drink|AGMH}s、{@item Hot Drink|AGMH}s、{@table plants|AGMH|Adamant Seeds, or Might Seeds}时；你周围20英尺范围内的其他生物都会获得其效果。

items.name: T.Teostra Gem
entries: {@i (Spellcaster only)} While wearing this armor you can use an action to cast the {@spell fire shield} (warm shield) spell from it. This property can be used twice, regaining all expended uses daily at dawn.

items.name: T.Fire Dragon Scale
entries: {@i Quick Load.}当你与此武器相适应时，你可以作为一个自由动作重新装弹。

items.name: T.Teostra Carapace
entries: {@i (Bow only) Special Ammo Boost+2.} Your coating now coats up to 30 arrows and your dragonpiercer deals an extra 3d6 piercing damage.

items.name: T.Teostra Claw
entries: Your weapon deals an extra {@damage 1d10} fire damage.

items.name: T.Teostra Webbing
entries: While attuned to this weapon, your fire spells bypass a creatures resistance and deal half damage to a creature that is immune to fire damage.

items.name: T.Teostra Tail
entries: Once per turn, when you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack using this Weapon, you can engulf the target in flames. At the start of each of the engulfed creature's turns, it takes {@damage 1d6} fire damage and it can then make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, putting out the flames on a successful save. Alternatively, the engulfed creature, or a creature within 5 feet of it, can use an action to smother the flames ending the effect.

items.name: T.Teostra Mane
entries: {@i Critical Eye+.}你的武器攻击关键命中范围增加2。

items.name: T.Teostra Horn
entries: {@i Reckless Abandon.} When you make your first attack on your turn with this weapon, you can choose to without care or regard for consequences. Doing so gives you advantage on melee weapon attack rolls using Strength during this turn, but disadvantage on all saving throws and all attack rolls against you have advantage until the start of your next turn.

items.name: T.Teostra Gem
entries: {@i Latent Power +2.} When you are reduced to half of your maximum hit points for the first time in combat or at the start of your turn on the 10th round of combat, whichever comes first, you gain the effects of the {@spell haste} spell for 1 minute. Once used, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use this property again.

items.name: Elder Dragon Blood
entries: 任何稀有的武器升级材料。

items.name: Elder Dragon Bone
entries: 任何稀有的装甲升级材料。

entries.name: A Teostra's Lair
entries: Teostra's lair in high mountains or volcanoes, dwelling in caverns underground in the desert, or within the deep halls of abandoned mines and dwarven strongholds. Caves with volcanic or geothermal activity are the most highly prized teostra's lair, creating hazards that hinder intruders and letting searing heat and volcanic gases wash over a teostra as it sleeps. On rare occasions they can be seen living in more temperate areas such as a swamp or ancient forest, changing the area around it to suit its needs.

A teostra's lair is sometimes confused with a red dragon's lair due to both of them mainly preferring areas with intense heat. On many occasions a teostra will attempt to take a red dragon's lair for its own, either by killing the red dragon or causing it to flee while gravely injured, leaving its horde of treasure behind. The teostra will guard this horde, mainly because it now belongs to him, but will typically not add to its treasure, being more concerned with intruders than riches.
A teostra encountered in its lair has a challenge rating of 14 (11,500 XP). A tempered teostra's challenge rating remains the same.

trait.name: Rime
entries: An area covered in rime is difficult terrain. Additionally any creature that ends its turn while touching a frost covered area takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage and is {@condition grappled} by the frost (Escape 20).

trait.name: Ice Armor (2/day)
entries: The velkhana can use a bonus action to coat its body in ice, giving it +2 AC for 1 minute, or until it takes 55 points of damage from a single creature on a turn.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: 如果天鹅绒的救赎失败，它可以选择成功。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 天鹅绒在对抗法术和其他魔法效果时有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The velkhana makes three attacks with its tail.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Breath Weapons
entries: 斯尔卡纳使用以下一种呼吸武器。

items.name: Cold Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The velkhana exhales an icy blast in a 90-foot line that is 5 feet wide. That area is covered in rime for 1 minute and each creature in that line must make a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 ({@damage 12d10}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Hoarfrost Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The velkhana exhales an icy blast of hoarfrost in a 60-foot cone. The area is covered in rime for 1 minute and each creature in that area must make a {@dc 23} Constitution saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Additionally, four 1 foot thick, 10-foot-square walls of ice form within the area and last for 10 minutes. If the wall is formed on a creature's space, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall and must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

Each 10-foot section of the wall has 12 AC and 30 hit points, and is vulnerable to fire damage. If damaged to 0 hit points, it leaves a hole filled with freezing air. The first time a creature moves through the air on a turn, it makes a {@dc 22} Constitution save, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) cold damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The velkhana covers the ground in a 15-foot radius in rime for 1 minute and it beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The velkhana can then fly up to half its flying speed.

legendary.name: Hail Storm (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The velkhana forms five boulder-sized chunks of ice from the water in the air that plummet to the ground at different points within 90 feet of it. Each creature in a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on each point that it chooses must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) cold damage and 9 ({@damage 2d8}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature in the area of more than one ice chunk is affected only once.
{@creature Velkhana|MHMM}是一种传统的龙，具有像{@creature kushala daora|MHMM}这样的长老龙的纤细、直立的身体结构。它的鳞片和外壳是一种独特的晶莹蓝色。它的头部有一个像提亚拉一样的小角冠。它可以召唤冰块来覆盖它的翅膀、四肢和尾巴。它那细长的长矛般的尾巴非常灵活，可以刺向敌人。
Velkhana可以自由地控制冰和冷风，并能在瞬间将大片区域覆盖在冰中。它喷出的超冷液体束可以瞬间冻结怪物。当它被冰甲覆盖时，附近会形成冰晶，当被Velkhana的冰息击中时，它们会形成大的尖顶，并很快爆炸。有时会形成小型冰台，可以从上面跳下。当它被激怒时，偶尔会从靠近地面的云层中喷出冰刺。

items.name: T.Crystal Shard
entries: {@i Flinch Free.}当穿上这个盔甲时，你不能被击倒{@condition prone}，或以任何方式不情愿地从你目前的位置移动。

items.name: T.Velkhana Cortex
entries: {@i Divine Blessing+3.} When you take damage you are not immune or resistant to, roll a d10 and reduce the damage you take by the number rolled. You can use this property a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier. You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

items.name: T.Velkhana Lash
entries: 当你穿上这件盔甲时，你可以抵抗寒冷的伤害，并对（%0%）疾病免疫。

items.name: T.Velkhana Hardclaw
entries: 当一个生物在你5英尺范围内接触或用近战武器攻击你时，你可以用你的反应让它做一个{@dc 16}宪法救赎动作。如果救赎失败，该生物会受到（%1%）的折磨，持续1分钟。生物可以在它的回合结束时重复它的救赎动作，如果成功则结束该效果。你可以使用这个属性的次数等于你的1+体质修改器（最少1次），当你完成长期休息时，可以恢复所有消耗的使用。

items.name: T.Velkhana Crownhorn
entries: {@i (Sorcerer, Warlock, & Wizard only)} This armor has two runes that it regains daily at dawn. As an action you can expend one of these runes to cast {@spell armor of agathys} at 5th level from it.

items.name: T.Velkhana Crystal
entries: 当你穿上这件盔甲时，你对寒冷伤害免疫。

items.name: T.Crystal Shard
entries: {@i Quick Sheath.}当你与此武器相适应时，即使你已经拔出武器作为你动作的一部分，你也可以随时以自由动作将其出鞘。

items.name: T.Velkhana Cortex
entries: While attuned to this weapon you can use an action to cast the wall of ice (save {@dc 17}) spell from it, but it deals only {@damage 5d6} cold damage and the wall is only 5 feet high. Once you use this property, new walls deal no damage and are only 3 feet tall until you finish along rest.

items.name: T.Velkhana Lash
entries: While you are attuned to this weapon, you can use a bonus action to speak its command word and exhale ice in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 6d6} cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
你可以使用这个属性两次，当你完成长期休息时，可以重新获得所有消耗的使用权。

items.name: T.Velkhana Hardclaw
entries: Your cold spells bypass a creature's resistance to cold damage while you are attuned to this weapon.

items.name: T.Velkhana Crownhorn
entries: {@i Critical Draw++.}在第一轮战斗中，你的近战武器攻击在掷出13个或更高的分数时获得关键打击。

items.name: T.Velkhana Crystal
entries: {@i Coalescence+.} Whenever you succeed on a saving throw to end a condition, you gain a +2 bonus to your attack rolls and spell save DC, and your weapon or spell attacks deal an extra {@damage 1d6} cold, fire, or lightning damage (your choice) until the end of your next turn.

items.name: Elder Dragon Blood
entries: 任何稀有的武器升级材料。

items.name: Elder Dragon Bone
entries: 任何稀有的装甲升级材料。

entries.name: T.Velkhana Divinity
entries: {@b Set bonus (2):} When you critically hit with a weapon or spell that deals cold damage, you deal an extra {@damage 1d8} cold damage.
{@b Set bonus (4):} An aura of frost builds when your weapon is sheathed for at least 1 minute. When you draw this weapon, it deals an extra {@damage 1d8} cold damage for the next 4 rounds.

trait.name: Fire Aura
entries: At the start of each of the teostra's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches the teostra or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Explosive Cloud
entries: At the start of the teostra's turn, it beats its wings and four clouds of explosive powder appear in unoccupied 5-foot cubes of air within 60 feet of the teostra. Additionally every 15 feet the Teostra moves, it leaves a cloud of explosive powder in a 5-foot cube. The clouds disperse after detonation, until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it, or when the teostra dies.
As a Bonus action, the teostra can move up to two of these clouds 10 feet in any direction.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The teostra's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The teostra makes three attacks; two claw attacks one bite or tail attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. On hit, the target must make a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Deadly Leap
entries: If the teostra jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked {@condition prone} and take 33 ({@damage 6d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked {@condition prone}, and is pushed 5 feet out of the teostra's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is with in range, the creature instead falls {@condition prone} in the teostra's space.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The teostra exhales fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 ({@damage 9d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

action.name: Supernova
entries: The teostra beats its wings rising 20 feet into the air and releases a large burst of fire all around it. Each creature within 25 foot radius of the teostra must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) fire damage and are pushed back 10 feet on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one and not pushed back.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The teostra moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The teostra makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Detonate (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: All Explosive Clouds detonate and burst into flames. Each creature within 10-feet of a explosive cloud must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one. If a creature is within range of more than one explosive cloud, they take an additional 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage for each additional cloud.

Teostra is a dragon with leonine features and a fiery coloration. It has a grand mane, large fangs, and a pair of horns that curve backward. Its wings are covered in fur. Teostra is the male counterpart to {@creature Lunastra|MHMM}. Being predatory Elder Dragons Teostra are powerful top predators and are easily capable of killing weaker animals such as {@creature Aptonoth|MHMM}, {@creature Conga|MHMM}, {@creature Bulldrome|MHMM}, {@creature Iodrome|MHMM}, {@creature Apceros|MHMM}, and {@creature Cephadrome|MHMM}. Armed with razor sharp claws and flesh ripping teeth these Elder Dragons make short work of prey and smaller predators.

Possessing mastery over flame, there are few creatures that can hope to last against Teostra for long. To defend itself, the Teostra also utilizes a heat shield which damages enemies that get too close. To keep its flame powers going, they consume coal in volcanic environments. It also has detachable wing scales or powder that explode when ignited from a spark made when Teostra bites. It uses these to defend itself from attackers, although they give little protection against enemies with resilience to extreme heat such as {@creature Akantor|MHMM} or {@creature Lavasioth|MHMM}.

Teostra can even use the powder for many close range attacks but more skilled Teostra have learnt to use the powder at long range. When Teostra angered, it will fly into the air and ignite the powder all at once. When the powder is all ignited, Teostra will be covered in a large burst of fire, that is sometimes referred to as the Supernova.

{@creature tempered teostra|MHMM|Some extremely rare individuals} have more control over their flaming powers than most. They have a different appearance also including more yellow wing webbing, a more reddish mane, red claws, orange tail end and golden eyes. New flame techniques include leaving pockets of explosive powder across the area in the air as it fights and setting them all a flame at will.

Teostra are a very aggressive monster. It will show dominance to anything that it encounters. Compared to Lunastra, who give warnings to get out of its territory, Teostra will ruthlessly attack intruders until they are dead. As one of the most aggressive Elder Dragons, Teostra are highly feared. It is not advised to go out into the Desert, Volcano, Swamp, or Tower when pairing with {@creature Lunastra|MHMM}, as the prospect of fighting both Lunastra and Teostra together is often considered suicidal.

items.name: Fire Dragon Scale
entries: {@i Biology.}当你穿着这件盔甲时，你会变得精通{@item dung bomb|AGMH}，而且你对{@condition waterblight|MHMM}、{@condition iceblight|MHMM}或{@spell blight}咒语等枯萎效果免疫。

items.name: Teostra Carapace
entries: While wearing this armor you can use an action to cast the {@spell protection from energy} (fire) spell from it. This property can be used twice, regaining all expended uses daily at dawn.

items.name: Teostra Webbing
entries: While wearing this armor you have resistance to fire damage.

items.name: Teostra Horn
entries: {@i Wide-Range.}当你使用{@table plants|AGMH|Herbs}、{@item Antidote|AGMH}s、{@item Cool Drink|AGMH}s、{@item Hot Drink|AGMH}s、{@table plants|AGMH|Adamant Seeds, or Might Seeds}时；你周围10英尺范围内的所有其他生物都会获得其效果。

items.name: Teostra Gem
entries: {@i (Spellcaster only)} While wearing this armor you can use an action to cast the {@spell fire shield} (warm shield) spell from it. Once used, you can't use this property again until the next dawn.

items.name: Fire Dragon Scale
entries: {@i Quick Load.}当你与此武器相适应时，你可以作为一个自由动作重新装弹。

items.name: Teostra Carapace
entries: {@i (Bow only) Special Ammo Boost+1.} Your coating now coats up to 25 arrows and your dragonpiercer deals an extra 2d6 piercing damage.

items.name: Teostra Claw
entries: 你的武器会造成额外的1d6火焰伤害。

items.name: Teostra Webbing
entries: {@i Weakness Exploit.}当你在使用此武器的攻击卷中拥有优势，并且你击中了目标，如果两个d20卷中较低的一个也会击中目标，你可以让你的武器造成最大的伤害（所有额外的伤害骰子仍然必须被掷出）。你可以使用这个属性的次数等于你的力量或灵巧修正值（由你选择），当你完成一个长时间的休息时，可以恢复所有消耗的使用。

items.name: Teostra Tail
entries: Once per turn, when you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack using this Weapon, you can engulf the target in flames. At the start of each of the engulfed creature's turns, it takes {@damage 1d4} fire damage and it can then make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, putting out the flames on a successful save. Alternatively, the engulfed creature, or a creature within 5 feet of it, can use an action to smother the flames ending the effect.

items.name: Teostra Mane
entries: {@i Critical Eye.}你的武器攻击关键命中范围增加1。

items.name: Teostra Horn
entries: {@i Reckless Abandon.} When you make your first attack on your turn with this weapon, you can choose to without care or regard for consequences. Doing so gives you advantage on melee weapon attack rolls using Strength during this turn, but disadvantage on all saving throws and all attack rolls against you have advantage until the start of your next turn.

items.name: Teostra Gem
entries: {@i Latent Power +1.}当你在战斗中第一次被降低到最大命中率的四分之一时，或者在战斗的第10轮开始时，以先到者为准，你会获得{@spell haste}的法术效果，持续1分钟。一旦使用，你必须完成一次短暂或长时间的休息，才能再次使用此属性。

items.name: Elder Dragon Blood
entries: 任何稀有的武器升级材料。

items.name: Elder Dragon Bone
entries: 任何稀有的装甲升级材料。

entries.name: A Teostra's Lair
entries: Teostra's lair in high mountains or volcanoes, dwelling in caverns underground in the desert, or within the deep halls of abandoned mines and dwarven strongholds. Caves with volcanic or geothermal activity are the most highly prized teostra's lair, creating hazards that hinder intruders and letting searing heat and volcanic gases wash over a teostra as it sleeps.
